sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT	 
	'@{variables('Home_Ref')}' AS HOME_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	RESIDENT.RES_CODE as resident_no,
	InvPosting.account_No, 
	InvPosting.Cre_DateT AS created_date, 
	InvPosting.Inv_Date AS transaction_date,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		ELSE ''
	END AS transaction_type,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS transaction_ref1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS transaction_ref2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS transaction_value, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS transaction_balance, 
	Memo,
	USERCOMM AS UserComment
FROM		 
	InvPosting (NOLOCK) 
	
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK) 
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT (NOLOCK)
		ON RESIDENT.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF
WHERE	
	InvPosting.Site_Ref  = '@{item().SITE_REF}'

SELECT HOME_REF, HomeName, SITE_REF 
FROM ColdHarbourHomeID 
WHERE SITE_REF = '@{item().SITE_REF}'

SELECT SITE_REF FROM ColdHarbourHomeID WHERE 
HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_ref_List')})

query.value:
SELECT * FROM fusion_avery.serviceuser
WHERE
	home_ID IN (@{variables('HomeIDList')})

properties.description: Extracts data Yardi require to single csv files for multiple homes

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    AmendDateTime,
    CreateDateTime,
    HOME_REF,
    OLOC_REF,
    OROOM_REF,
    ROOM_CAT,
    ROOM_CAT_DESC,
    ROOM_CODE,
    ROOM_DESC,
    ROOM_NO_BEDS,
    ROOM_REF,
    ROOM_TYPE,
    ROOM_TYPE_DESC,
    CHARGEPERIOD,
    CURRENTRATE,
    RATEDATE,
    ROOM_UDF1,
    ROOM_UDF2,
    ROOM_UDF3,
    ROOM_UDF4,
    USEFLAG
FROM 
    dbo.ROOMS
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
    ,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN CHARINDEX(' and ', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME LIKE ' %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN LTRIM(RES_FNAME)
        WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) LIKE '% %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(LTRIM(RES_FNAME), 1, CHARINDEX(' ', LTRIM(RES_FNAME) + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,CASE 
        WHEN LTRIM(RES_SNAME) = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
        ELSE LTRIM(RES_SNAME)
    END AS RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(LTRIM(Forenames), '.', ''), ',', ''), '*', ''), '|', ''), '?', '') AS Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(LTRIM(Surname), '.', ''), ',', ''), '*', ''), '|', ''), '?', ''), ';', '') AS Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')}))

SELECT 
    ACTDEATHDT
    ,ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,AD_REF
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CAUSE
    ,CAUSEDEATH
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DATE
    ,DISCHDECEAS
    ,DISDEST
    ,DISREASON
    ,DISTYPE
    ,DOCTOR
    ,FINALDISCH
    ,HOME_REF
    ,INITIALADM
    ,INOUT
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MOVE_REF
    ,PLACE
    ,REASON
    ,RES_REF
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,TIME
    ,MOVE_TIME
    ,ANALCHANGE
    ,COMPOSITE
    ,MOVESUB_REF
    ,PREVDISDEST
    ,PREVDISTYPE
FROM 
    dbo.ADMIN_DISCHARGE
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT
    ACCNO
    ,ACCSUFFIX
    ,ACCTYPE
    ,ACCTYPE2
    ,ACCTYPE_DECODE
    ,ACC_REF
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CALENDAR
    ,CAL_REF
    ,CHGPER
    ,Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Cont_Ref
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DAILYRATE

    ,FINALINV
    ,FS_REF
    ,FUNDSOURCE
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTRATEDT
    ,ORIGREF
    ,PENSBOOK
    ,PROFILE
    ,RATE
    ,RECGRP
    ,RECGRPDESC
    ,RELACCREF
    ,RES_REF
    ,RecType
    ,STARTDATE
    ,SUFFIXSUPERCEDED
    ,ANAL3
    ,ATTENTION
    ,AUTHORISED
    ,CONSULTANT
    ,CRCONTROL
    ,DEBTORCODE
    ,FUNDREQEDI
    ,FURC_DEC
    ,INPFUNDAPR
    ,LOCALITY
    ,NURFUNDAPR
    ,RECONCILED
    ,BANKACC
    ,BANKACCNAME
    ,BANKADDRESS1
    ,BANKADDRESS2
    ,BANKADDRESS3
    ,BANKADDRESS4
    ,BANKNAME
    ,BANKPOSTCODE
    ,BANKSORTCODE
    ,BANKSTREF
    ,BANKTRTYPE
    ,DDMANDREF
    ,SOCOLDAY
    ,SOCOLLECT
    ,SOVALUE
    ,USAGE
    ,CALCODE
    ,PCTDESC
    ,REVDATE
FROM 
    ACCOUNT 
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT 
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,EMAIL
    ,FundSourceName
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Inv_Narrative
    ,PostCode
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,CQUIN
    ,CQUIN_REF
    ,CQUIN_TYPE
    ,EDICONTACT
    ,PAYDAYS
    ,PAYDAYSDOM
    ,PAYDAYSDOMDESC
    ,PAYMONTH
    ,PAYMONTHDESC
FROM 
    dbo.FSCONTACTS
WHERE
    GRGApp_GrGsRef IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 'XRR227' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XRR227.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XRR227.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XAWT01' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XAWT01.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XAWT01.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XKR117' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XKR117.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1
			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XKR117.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XWWT03' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,

                FROM XWWT03.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1

		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY

	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XLR118' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,

                FROM XLR118.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1

		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS

                OUTER APPLY(

			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS

SELECT 'KNOW03' AS CompanyCode,

                OUTER APPLY(

			            D.tlAcCode,
			            D.tlLineDate
		            FROM
			            XBR120.DETAILS AS D
		            WHERE
			            D.tlAcCode = C.acCode COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
		            ORDER BY
			            D.tlLineDate DESC
	            ) AS LastTransDate
                
                UNION ALL
SELECT 'XFR121' AS CompanyCode, 
                LastTransDate.tlLineDate AS LatestDate,
                C.* 
                FROM XFR121.CUSTSUPP AS C
               
                OUTER APPLY(
		            SELECT TOP 1

    ,acSSDDeliveryTerms
    ,acInclusiveVATCode
    ,acSSDModeOfTransport
    ,acPrivateRec

    ,acEmailAddr

    ,acUserDef5

    ,acUserDef7

    ,acMandateID
    ,acMandateDate
    ,acDeliveryPostCode
    ,acSubType
    ,acLongAcCode
    ,acAllowOrderPayments
    ,acOrderPaymentsGLCode

    ,acDeliveryCountry
    ,acPPDMode
    ,acDefaultToQR
    ,acTaxRegion
    ,acAnonymisationStatus
    ,acAnonymisedDate
    ,acAnonymisedTime
    ,acRCEndUser
    ,PositionId
FROM 
    dbo.ExchequerVendors
WHERE
    CompanyCode IN (@{variables('CompanyCodeList')})

activities.name: Company List
activities.description: Sets an array to contain the list of companies required for exporting

activities.name: List ID
activities.description: Converts the company IDs in the array to a list variable to be used in the SQL Query Source in Export Vendors

activities.name: Export billing profiles and Calendars used

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	P.PRO_CODE AS profile_code,
	P.PRODESC AS profile_description,
	CALENDAR.CAL_REF AS Cal_Ref,
	CALENDAR.CAL_CODE AS calendar_code,
	CALENDAR.CAL_DESC AS calendar_description	
FROM 
	FUNDSRC_HD AS ACC

	LEFT JOIN PROFILES AS P
		ON P.PRO_REF = ACC.PRO_REF

	LEFT JOIN CONTACT_HD AS CONTACT
		ON CONTACT.CONTACT_REF = ACC.CNTA_DET_REF

	LEFT JOIN CALENDAR_HD AS CALENDAR
		ON CALENDAR.CAL_REF = ACC.CAL_REF
WHERE
	P.FSTYPE = 401

SELECT DISTINCT
    Site.SiteName
    ,Site.SiteId
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_code AS calendar_code
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_desc as calendar_description
    ,DECGrouping.Description AS calendar_grouping
    ,Calendar_Hd.Invdtoff
    ,Calendar_Hd.Invdttype
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldStartDt AS calendar_start_date
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldEndDt AS calendar_end_date
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldFreq AS frequency
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldDays AS no_of_days
    ,Calendar_Hd.ProcFlag
    ,Calendar_Hd.SiteFilter
    ,Calendar_Hd.Sched_Only
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoProc
    ,Calendar_Hd.ProcOffset
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoProcWarn
    ,Calendar_Hd.InvOffset
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoInvWarn
    ,Calendar_Dt.StartDate AS period_start_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.EndDate AS period_end_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.BillDate AS period_bill_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.SSProcessDate
    ,Calendar_Dt.SSInvoiceDate
FROM 
	Calendar_Hd (NOLOCK)
    
	JOIN ChSysDec AS DECGrouping (NOLOCK)
        ON DECGrouping.Decode_Ref = Calendar_Hd.Grouping
    
	JOIN Calendar_Dt (NOLOCK)
        ON Calendar_Dt.Cal_Ref = Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
    
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
        ON Site.Site_Ref IN (
                                SELECT Site_Ref
                                FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK)
                                WHERE Site_Join.LinkKey = Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
                                      AND upper(Site_Join.LinkTable) = 'CALENDAR_HD'
                            )
           OR Calendar_Hd.SiteFilter = 0
WHERE 
	Calendar_Hd.Cal_Code
    BETWEEN '      ' AND 'ZZZZZZ'
    AND Calendar_Dt.StartDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
    AND Calendar_Dt.EndDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
    AND (
            Calendar_Dt.BillDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
            OR Calendar_Dt.BillDate IS NULL
        )
    AND Site.SITEID IN (
	071,
	072,
	073,
	074,
	075,
	078,
	079,
	086,
	089,
	088,
	091,
	092,
	090,
	095,
	096,
	097,
	098,
	099,
	100,
	101,
	102,
	103,
	104,
	105,
	106,
	107,
	108,
	109,
	110,
	111,
	112,
	113,
	114,
	115,
	116,
	117,
	118,
	119,
	120,
	121,
	122,
	123,
	127,
	128
	)
ORDER BY 
	Calendar_Hd.Cal_code

SELECT 
    H.HOME_REF
    ,SiteName
    --,Cal.SiteId
    ,Cal_Ref
    ,calendar_code
    ,calendar_description
    ,calendar_grouping
    --,Invdtoff
    --,Invdttype
    ,calendar_start_date
    ,calendar_end_date
    ,frequency
    ,no_of_days
    ,ProcFlag
    ,SiteFilter
    ,Sched_Only
    --,AutoProc
    --,ProcOffset
    --,AutoProcWarn
    --,InvOffset
    --,AutoInvWarn
    ,period_start_date
    ,period_end_date
    ,period_bill_date
    ,SSProcessDate
    ,SSInvoiceDate
FROM 
    dbo.Calendars AS Cal

    LEFT JOIN dbo.ColdHarbourHomeID AS H
        ON H.SITEID = Cal.SiteID

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT	 
	'@{variables('Home_Ref')}' AS HOME_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	RESIDENT.RES_CODE as resident_no,
	InvPosting.account_No, 
	InvPosting.Cre_DateT AS created_date, 
	InvPosting.Inv_Date AS transaction_date,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		ELSE ''
	END AS transaction_type,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS transaction_ref1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS transaction_ref2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS transaction_value, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS transaction_balance, 
	Memo,
	USERCOMM AS UserComment
FROM		 
	InvPosting (NOLOCK) 
	
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK) 
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT (NOLOCK)
		ON RESIDENT.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF
WHERE	
	InvPosting.Site_Ref  = '@{variables('SITE_REF')}'
SELECT HOME_REF, HomeName, SITE_REF FROM ColdHarbourHomeID WHERE HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

properties.description: Runs the child pipelines that move and process files generated by the webhook/azure function
Files stored in averyblob fusion container. Connected through the Avery virtual network using the private endpoing
Files stored in averyblob fusion container. Connected through the Avery virtual network using the private endpoing
Scheduled to trigger once at 10:15pm, Everyday
The Details (Ledger) from Exchequer for the previous financial Year

activities.name: Company List and Previous Year
activities.description: List company codes and the previous year, used to refresh the details data for the previous financial year BEFORE running the Current Fin Year

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @Today AS DATE = GETDATE()
DECLARE @PreviousYear AS DATE = DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(YEAR,-1,@Today)), MONTH(@Today), 1)

SELECT 
	HomeID, 
    IntranetID,
	Homename, 
	ExchCode,
    CompanyPeriods.ExchequerYear,
    CompanyPeriods.PeriodYear,
    CompanyPeriods.PeriodNo,
    CompanyPeriods.CalendarFullDescription
FROM 
	Avery.HomeDetails

    LEFT JOIN Exchequer.CompanyPeriods
        ON CompanyPeriods.ExchCompanyCode = HomeDetails.ExchCode
        AND CompanyPeriods.PeriodReportDate = @PreviousYear
WHERE
	ExchCode IS NOT NULL
	AND ExchCode != 'KETT01' --Doesnt exist in Exchequer
ORDER BY
	HomeId ASC

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT TOP 100 
	[tlFolioNum]
	,[tlLineNo]
	,[tlRunNo]
	,[tlGLCode]
	,[tlNominalMode]
	,[tlCurrency]
	,[tlYear]
	,[tlPeriod]
	,[tlDepartment]
	,[tlCostCentre]
	,[tlDocType]
	,[tlQty]
	,[tlQtyMul]
	,[tlNetValue]
	,[tlDiscount]
	,[tlVATCode]
	,[tlVATAmount]
	,[tlPaymentCode]
	,[tlOldPBal]
	,[tlRecStatus]
	,[tlDiscFlag]
	,[tlQtyWOFF]
	,[tlQtyDel]
	,[tlCost]
	,[tlAcCode]
	,[tlLineDate]
	,[tlItemNo]
	,[tlDescription]
	,[tlJobCode]
	,[tlAnalysisCode]
	,[tlOurRef]
	,[tlPreviousBalance]
	,[PositionId]
FROM 
	@{variables('Exch_Schema')}.DETAILS

SELECT
	'@{item().ExchCode}' AS ExchCompanyCode
	,'@{item().HomeID}' AS HomeID
	,'@{item().IntranetID}' AS IntranetID
	,'@{item().Homename}' AS Homename
	,L.[tlFolioNum]
	,L.[tlLineNo]
	,L.[tlRunNo]
	,L.[tlGLCode]
	,L.[tlNominalMode]
	,L.[tlCurrency]
	,L.[tlYear]
	,L.[tlPeriod]
	,L.[tlDepartment]
	,L.[tlCostCentre]
	,L.[tlDocType]
	,L.[tlQty]
	,L.[tlQtyMul]
	,L.[tlNetValue]
	,L.[tlDiscount]
	,L.[tlVATCode]
	,L.[tlVATAmount]
	,L.[tlPaymentCode]
	,L.[tlOldPBal]
	,L.[tlRecStatus]
	,L.[tlDiscFlag]
	,L.[tlQtyWOFF]
	,L.[tlQtyDel]
	,L.[tlCost]
	,L.[tlAcCode]
	,L.[tlLineDate]
	,L.[tlItemNo]
	,L.[tlDescription]
	,L.[tlJobCode]
	,L.[tlAnalysisCode]
	,L.[tlOurRef]
	,L.[tlPreviousBalance]
	,L.[PositionId] AS DetailsPositionId
	,H.thYourRef
	,H.thLongYourRefTrans
	,H.thOurRef
	,H.thPostedDate
	,H.thCreationDate
	,H.thDueDate
	,H.PositionId AS DocumentPositionId
FROM 
	@{item().ExchCode}.DETAILS AS L

	LEFT JOIN @{item().ExchCode}.DOCUMENT AS H
		ON H.thOurRef = L.tlOurRef
WHERE
	L.tlYear = '@{item().ExchequerYear}'

activities.name: Delete Previous Year Data
activities.description: Runs the Procedure DeleteDetails$CompanyAndYear to delete the companies previous year data that was collected in the previous activity

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    STG_Details.[ExchCompanyCode]
    ,STG_Details.[HomeID]
    ,STG_Details.[IntranetID]
    ,STG_Details.[Homename]
    ,STG_Details.[tlOurRef]
    ,STG_Details.thYourRef
    ,STG_Details.thLongYourRefTrans
    ,STG_Details.[tlFolioNum]
    ,STG_Details.[tlLineNo]
    ,STG_Details.[tlRunNo]
    ,STG_Details.[tlGLCode]
    ,GeneralLedgerCategory.GL_Name
    ,STG_Details.[tlNominalMode]
    ,STG_Details.[tlCurrency]
    ,CompanyPeriods.PeriodReportDate
    ,STG_Details.[tlYear]
    ,CompanyPeriods.[PeriodYear]
    ,STG_Details.[tlPeriod]
    ,CompanyPeriods.CalendarMonthLongName
    ,CalendarFullDescription
    ,STG_Details.[thCreationDate]
    ,STG_Details.[thPostedDate]
    ,STG_Details.[tlLineDate]
    ,STG_Details.[tlDepartment]
    ,STG_Details.[tlCostCentre]
    ,STG_Details.[tlDocType]
    ,STG_Details.[tlQty]
    ,STG_Details.[tlQtyMul]
    ,STG_Details.[tlNetValue]
    ,STG_Details.[tlDiscount]
    ,STG_Details.[tlVATCode]
    ,STG_Details.[tlVATAmount]
    ,STG_Details.[tlPaymentCode]
    ,STG_Details.[tlOldPBal]
    ,STG_Details.[tlRecStatus]
    ,STG_Details.[tlDiscFlag]
    ,STG_Details.[tlQtyWOFF]
    ,STG_Details.[tlQtyDel]
    ,STG_Details.[tlCost]
    ,STG_Details.[tlAcCode]
    ,STG_Details.[tlItemNo]
    ,STG_Details.[tlDescription]
    ,STG_Details.[tlJobCode]
    ,STG_Details.[tlAnalysisCode]
    ,STG_Details.[tlPreviousBalance]
    ,STG_Details.[DetailsPositionId]
    ,STG_Details.[DocumentPositionId]

FROM 
    [Exchequer].[STG_Details]

    LEFT JOIN Exchequer.CompanyPeriods
        ON CompanyPeriods.ExchCompanyCode = STG_Details.ExchCompanyCode
        AND CompanyPeriods.ExchequerYear = STG_Details.tlYear
        AND CompanyPeriods.PeriodNo = STG_Details.tlPeriod

    LEFT JOIN Exchequer.GeneralLedgerCategory 
        ON GeneralLedgerCategory.GL_CODE = STG_Details.tlGLCode
ORDER BY
    [STG_Details].tlYear ASC,
    [STG_Details].tlPeriod ASC,
    [STG_Details].ExchCompanyCode ASC
